sentences.en: An infected mucous membrane, especially of the tongue, nose and larynx, commonly becomes ulcerated.
sentences.cn: 感染的粘膜, 特别是舌, 鼻和咽的粘膜, 通常变成溃疡.

sentences.en: Calf diphtheria, is characterized by bilateral necrosis of the mucous membrane of the larynx.
sentences.cn: 犊白喉, 以喉粘膜的两侧性环死为特征.

sentences.en: D : The mucous membrane of your nose appears markedly pale and edematous.
sentences.cn: 您鼻粘膜显得特别苍白并且还有些水肿.

sentences.en: Healthy, skin, mucous membranes, and cilia are natural barriers to many viruses.
sentences.cn: 健康的皮肤, 粘膜和纤毛是许多病毒的天然屏障.

sentences.en: However, eversion of the cervical mucous good elasticity, the more tidy edge.
sentences.cn: 但外翻的宫颈粘膜弹性好, 边缘较整齐.

sentences.en: In addition the mucous membranes are covered with fluids containing antifungal substances.
sentences.cn: 还有粘膜表面液体中的抗菌物质.

sentences.en: Inflammation of the mucous membrane of the stomach and intestines.
sentences.cn: 属于、关于肠系膜的,或位于肠系膜内的.

sentences.en: Latin word originally means a mucous excretion.
sentences.cn: 这个拉丁词,原意为含粘液的分泌物.

sentences.en: Methods Smears of 101 cases with nasal mucous ulcer were studied.
sentences.cn: 方法:鼻内镜下对101例鼻腔黏膜溃疡的涂片检查.

sentences.en: Mucous membranes or breaks in the skin were likely alternative entryways into the body.
sentences.cn: 粘膜或者皮肤上的破裂处都可能成为病毒入侵的通道.

sentences.en: Objective To study the diagnose of nasal mucous ulcer under nasal endoscopy.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨鼻内镜下鼻腔黏膜溃疡诊断.

sentences.en: Produce the skin, mucous membranes, gastrointestinal and respiratory symptoms.
sentences.cn: 产生皮肤 、 粘膜 、 消化道和呼吸道等症状.

sentences.en: Seromucous glands contain both mucous and serous cells.
sentences.cn: 浆粘液腺既含有粘液性细胞,又含有浆液性细胞.

sentences.en: The main rhinal symptoms were cheese - like mucous discharge and nasal obstruction.
sentences.cn: 鼻部主要症状为奶酪 状 黏涕、鼻塞.

sentences.en: We evolved to stay away from poo, from bodily fluids, from mucous, from foods that have gone off, from worms in the garden.
sentences.cn: 我们进化到如此阶段：避开屎，避开体液，避开粘液，不要碰变质的食物，不要动花园的虫子。

sentences.en: Why do you want the mucous membrane coated with barium?
sentences.cn: 为什么要用钡附着在黏膜上 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 类黏蛋白的；似黏液的；黏液状的
